net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes
Class AbstractBayesianClassifier_compact

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.javaml.classification.AbstractClassifier
      net.sf.javaml.classification.bayes.AbstractBayesianClassifier_compact
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Classifier
public class AbstractBayesianClassifier_compact
extends AbstractClassifier

Compact Abstract Bayesian classifier (supervised). This classifier calculates and stores Bayesian frequencies (numerator of Bayesian probabilities) out of the dataset. Specific Bayesian models build further on this class (Naive Bayes, KDB, ...) The compact version doesnt use lists of sampleids: used by entropy based discretisation methods.

Author:
Lieven Baeyens
See Also:

public AbstractBayesianClassifier_compact(boolean lap,
                                          boolean log,
                                          boolean sparse)
Instantiate the Compact Abstract Bayesian classifier algorithm.

Parameters:
lap - laplace correction
log - logarithmic results to avoid rounding results to zero because of limited computer precision
sparse - sparseness of used dataset
